ai-tha-ap247:1.1_0: “There is no need for the Fortunate One,
ai-tha-ap247:2.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap247:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap247:2.4_0: this is the fruit for giving.
ai-tha-ap247:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kuṭikaṇṇa.
